SEARCH
Package com.influxdb.client

Interface UsersApi

@ThreadSafe public interface UsersApi
The client of the InfluxDB 2.x that implement User HTTP API endpoint.
Author:
Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (11/09/2018 10:05)
